comment.body:
> C&P Services

Here is what it says me:

```no-highlight
Welcome!
It looks like you're using an ad blocker. That's okay. Who doesn't?
But without advertising-income, we can't keep making this site awesome.
```

Lol, okay. Deleted and blacklisted it.

> [zeropyro](#comment_5_1KsFe6vgVpNFCNTQDQryrcQYySkAbFLXCV): NOTHING IS FREE IN THE LIFE!

Sure. And it is you who wants to run a miner on my hardware, not me.
My time is not so cheap to spend it for reading sites that tell me how I should process data on my hardware, whether I should turn AdBlock on or off, etc.

I can potentially get around your silly splash screen, but I prefer to play fair game. You are not nice to your visitors, so I won't be your visitor. So I blacklisted your site.

> [zeropyro](#comment_6_1KsFe6vgVpNFCNTQDQryrcQYySkAbFLXCV): And how much encounter battery problems? Are you tested? 

> [zeropyro](#comment_7_1KsFe6vgVpNFCNTQDQryrcQYySkAbFLXCV): i don't care

Lol.

Here in Russia, we have a saying: Три дня я гналась за вами, чтобы сказать, как вы мне безразличны - I've been chasing you for three days just to say how much I don't care.

The forum doesn't work. 
`data/users/content.json` cannot be downloaded.

I guess you didn't sign the file or so...
